meta.job_title: Java Architect / Sr Developer / Sr Java Developer

skills.skill: Big Data Streaming (Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, Apache Ignite)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop various applications utilizing a wide range of technologies
Utilize strong knowledge of frameworks, design patterns, and core Java in the development process
Implement integration frameworks such as Apache Camel, Mulesoft, and Spring
Utilize JMS and message queue brokers, and demonstrate strong foundation in Object-Oriented Programming and Design Patterns
Handle automated build platforms/continuous integration and troubleshoot applications using logs
Work with Unix platforms, databases (Oracle), and streaming Big Data using Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, Apache Ignite or similar technologies
Apply agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) and demonstrate the ability to interpret and troubleshoot applications

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
